practiceAreas: Personal Injury|Motor Vehicle Accidents|Construction Accidents|Premise Liability|Medical Malpractice|Motorcycle Accidents|Zantac Lawsuits
description:
Mainetti & Mainetti P.C. in Poughkeepsie, New York, is a results-driven law firm that dedicates the full breadth of its resources to helping victims of personal injury pursue the maximum amount of compensation from at-fault parties. Unable to work and facing a growing mound of medical bills, these individuals often arrive at the free initial consultation feeling defeated and alone. To make matters worse, insurance companies use every tactic in the book to minimize the value of a claim or to avoid paying it entirely. Familiar with these tactics, and with tried-and-true strategies of our own, our attorneys serve as the knowledgeable and aggressive advocates victims of negligence need and deserve.

Founded in 1972, our law firm has amassed a long-standing reputation for passionately pursuing justice on behalf of injured parties. The vigor with which we represent clients enables us to garner half-a-million to multimillion-dollar verdicts in cases involving the following:

  • Motor vehicle accidents
  • Motorcycle accidents
  • Medical malpractice
  • Brain injury
  • Birth injury
  • Animal bites
  • Construction accidents
  • Premises liability
  • Zantac lawsuits

Our law firm and its attorneys are the recipients of numerous awards and recognitions from prestigious organizations. Some such organizations include the American Association for Justice, Super Lawyers and The National Trial Lawyers.

The attorneys at Mainetti & Mainetti P.C. proudly devote their careers to helping people who are going through some of the worst times of their lives. When clients entrust their cases to us, they can have peace of mind that we will remain responsive and supportive every step of the way. We go above and beyond to take the stress out of the claims process, including accepting credit cards as payment.
